Title: BERNEY Roman Numerals Swiss Pocket Watch Pendant with Gold Shield Overlay
Description: BERNEY Roman Numerals Swiss Pocket Watch Pendant with Gold Shield Overlay Swedemom is proud to present this Gold Overlay Engraved Miniature Pocket Watch Pendant from Berney. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (both CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The round gold 18mm dial (face) is signed "Berney," "Quartz," and "Swiss Made." It has black Roman numerals, hour, and minute hands. The back of the 23mm case is decorated with engraved gold shield against gold overlay. This Brand New, battery operated watch features an ETA SWISS MOVEMENT. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
